## OnEvent() function

ONLY for  and  classes (type === "COMPONENT")

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function OnEvent(event: AppEvent): MethodDecorator;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

event


</td><td>

[AppEvent](./koatty_core.appevent.md)


</td><td>

The AppEvent to bind to


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

MethodDecorator

MethodDecorator

## Exceptions

Error if used on non-Plugin/Component class

## Example


```ts
@Component("RouterComponent", { scope: 'core', priority: 100 })
class RouterComponent implements IComponent {

  @OnEvent(AppEvent.loadRouter)
  async initRouter(app: KoattyApplication) {
    // initialize router
  }

  @OnEvent(AppEvent.appStop)
  async cleanup(app: KoattyApplication) {
    // cleanup resources
  }
}
```
